code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{API_URL}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CheckInForm(_ref){let{students,onCheckIn}=_ref;const[studentId,setStudentId]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleCheckIn=async()=>{if(!studentId)return alert("Enter student ID");setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/checkins"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({student_id:parseInt(studentId)})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Check-in failed");const data=await res.json();onCheckIn(data);setStudentId("");}catch(err){alert(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Student ID",value:studentId,onChange:e=>setStudentId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCheckIn,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Checking...":"Check In"})]});}export default CheckInForm;
